plugins.name: skill-marketplace-design
plugins.description: Design patterns for Claude Code skill marketplaces. Use when: (1) Setting up team knowledge capture, (2) Implementing /advise and /retrospective, (3) Designing plugin validation. Meta: this skill documents its own design.

plugins.name: github-actions-mojo
plugins.description: GitHub Actions CI setup for Mojo projects. Use when: (1) Setting up Mojo CI/CD, (2) Configuring pixi with GitHub Actions, (3) Running mojo test in CI. Verified with Mojo v0.25.7.

plugins.name: mojo-simd-errors
plugins.description: Debug SIMD vectorization errors in Mojo. Use when: (1) SIMD comparison operators fail, (2) Conditional selection with masks, (3) Vectorized tensor operations. Verified on Mojo v0.25.7+.

plugins.name: layerwise-gradient-check
plugins.description: Layerwise gradient checking for neural network testing. Use when: (1) Validating backward pass implementations, (2) Debugging gradient computation, (3) TDD for neural network layers. Verified with Mojo tensor operations.

plugins.name: grpo-external-vllm
plugins.description: GRPO training with external vLLM server. Use when: (1) Running vLLM on separate GPUs, (2) Encountering vllm_skip_weight_sync errors, (3) OpenAI API parsing issues. Verified on gemma-3-12b-it.
